Why Dabur Gulabari Rose Water?
• 100% pure & natural
• No added preservatives
• Natural skin toner
• Cleanses, refreshes & cools the skin
• Good for all skin types
Directions:

• Rinse your face with water
• Get glowing & radiant rose like skin"

Himalaya's Purifying Neem Face Wash is a soap-free formulation that cleans impurities and helps clear pimples.

Neem
Neem is an excellent skincare ingredient known for its antibacterial properties. It improves general skin health and combating bacterial infection like acne.

Turmeric
Turmeric has been used as an antiseptic for centuries and is regarded as one of nature's most powerful healers. The herb helps to even out your skin tone and color, making it an excellent ingredient in a face wash. Turmeric has strong anti-inflammatory properties, which help soothe your skin.

bengaliName: হিমালয়া লিপ বাম ১০ গ্রাম
longDesc:
Origin: India
Manufacturer: The Himalaya Drugs Ltd.
Himalaya Lip Balm, designed with the time tested herbs relieves sore and chapped lips, especially during the winter season.
Ingredients:
Carrot Seed Oil
Carrot Seed Oil reported to be rich in Vitamin A in the form of beta-carotene which is known to protect from sun burn. Carrot is an excellent natural antioxidant, which scavenges free radicals.
 
Castor Oil
Castor Oil is used externally to relieve various skin conditions like dry skin, cracks and sunburn.
 
Coconut Oil
Coconut Oil is an effective emollient and used externally for softening lips. In addition, it is an effective moisturizer for all skin types including dry skin.
 
Sweet Indrajao
Sweet Indrajao is used in traditional systems of medicine for its multiple skin care benefits. Its astringent, and anti-inflammatory property helps manage skin conditions.
Wheat Germ Oil
Wheat Germ Oil is a rich source of natural Vitamin E which nourishes the skin and prevents moisture loss. It exhibits excellent skin conditioning activity which tones and softens the lips.
name: Himalaya Lip Balm  10 gm

bengaliName: প্যারাস্যুট স্কিনপিওর পেট্রোলিয়াম জেলী ১০০ মিলি
longDesc:
Parachute SkinPure Petroleum Jelly
Enriched with the goodness of Aloe Vera & Cocolipid, Parachute Advansed Petroleum Jelly gives you skin Soft & Naturally Glowing skin
Instructions for Best Usage:
1. Relieve dry skin, including your lips. Dry skin can flake, itch, crack and even bleed. Since petroleum jelly is more effective and less irritating than lotions, apply Parachute Advansed Petroleum Jelly to dry skin, including your lips. For the best results, always apply Parachute Advansed Petroleum Jelly when your skin is damp.

2. Help injured skin heal: for minor wounds such as cuts, scrapes and scratches, use Parachute Advansed Petroleum Jelly to keep the wound moist. This helps prevent the wound from drying out and forming a scab, as scabs take longer to heal. This will also help prevent a scar from getting too large, deep or itchy.

3. Prevent chafing: Chafing is a painful skin irritation that occurs when body parts rub together or rub against clothing. To prevent chafing that can lead to blisters, apply Parachute Advansed Petroleum Jelly to problem areas, such as the feet or thighs.
name: Parachute SkinPure Petroleum Jelly 100 ml

bengaliName: প্যরাস্যুট স্কিনপিওর পেট্রোলিয়াম জেলী ৫০ গ্রাম
